product_name: The North Face Poquito Insulated Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The North Face Poquito insulated jacket offers waterproofness and breathability for little girls who make turns on the slopes or snowballs in the backyard. 2-layer HyVent(R) uses a multilayer polyurethane coating for waterproof protection and durability. Adjustable cuff tabs with rip-and-stick closures. Fully sealed seams prevent leaks; nylon taffeta lining wicks moisture and eases layering. Durable polyester insulation provides a high weight-to-warmth ratio and quick compression recovery. EZ Grow cuffs let you lengthen sleeves as your child grows. Hood withstands intense weather with ease and comfort. The North Face Poquito insulated jacket features zippered pockets that store small essentials and help keep little hands warm.
short_description: The North Face Poquito insulated jacket offers waterproofness and breathability for little girls who make turns on the slopes or snowballs in the backyard.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
